Valuable Aboriginal art collected by Dame Rosie and Michael Horton goes to Australian gallery after Auckland declined https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/valuable-aboriginal-art-collected-by-dame-rosie-and-michael-horton-goes-to-australian-gallery-after-auckland-declined/HHYFPOTW75C6PLGYEGEZQKROMA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/valuable-aboriginal-art-collected-by-dame-rosie-and-michael-horton-goes-to-australian-gallery-after-auckland-declined/HHYFPOTW75C6PLGYEGEZQKROMA/ Jane PhareA Sydney gallery has been gifted a multimillion-dollar Kiwi collection of Aboriginal art. Sat, 31 Aug 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Former publisher of the New Zealand Herald Michael Horton, 85, and his wife, the late philanthropist Dame Rosie Horton, collected the artwork for more than 20 years.

Sun, 01 Sep 2024 03:00:00 +0000 Robert Telford with Suki, who has been the focus of a protracted legal case after she bit another dog in an Auckland park. Suki died last year before her case helped resolve a grey area of the law. Photo / Robert Telford
